Name: Creation
Desc:
Creates Ether Swords with your current Ether. The number of Ether Swords are automatically adjusted based on the level of current Ether.
Ether Swords automatically attack nearby enemies and aren't affected by enemies in the Damage Reflection status. Can be toggled On/Off. Lv. 10 Effect: Can learn Order.

H.Old:
When Trigger Skills hit, attacks up to 10 enemies at 200% damage every 9.5 sec. Upon 3rd/4th Job Advancement, delay between attacks are reduced by 4 sec.
1 attacks per Ether Sword.
When attack hits, 30% chance to create an Ether Crystal.
Cooldown: 500 sec.
H.New:
When Trigger skills hit, attacks up to 10 enemies at 200% Damage every 9.5 sec. Upon 3rd/4th Job Advancement, delay between attacks are reduced by 4 sec.
1 attacks per Ether Sword.
Attacks create a 30% chance of creating an Ether Crystal.
Cooldown: 500 sec.
